Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Literary papyrus
Description: The papyrus P. Lille 85 is very close to P. Lille 86, because of the state of the support and the arrangement of the writing. They therefore cannot be very far from one other in the primitive "volumen", but currently do not offer any immediate junction between them.
